name: Lucid Bots
headline: We build robots for dull, dirty, and dangerous jobs.
description:
At Lucid, we are a B2B robotics provider for dull, dirty, and dangerous jobs, starting with the cleaning industry, which has a 200% annual turnover rate. 

Our primary product is a drone that can clean anything from windows to roofs to stadium domes to industrial tanks. Our drones can clean up to 8x faster. Due to customer demand, we also launched a ground-based pressure-washing robot to complement our cleaning drone.

We support customers around the country who use our robots every day to clean properties with great safety and efficiency. We engineer, manufacture, and support our technology from a 20,000 sqft headquarters in Charlotte, NC.

founders.name: Andrew Ashur, Founder
founders.description: Andrew manages the overall operations of Lucid, including product development, strategic partnerships, and investor relations. He is a prolific learner with a demonstrated track record for extreme productivity. Andrew graduated with a double major from Davidson College in just three years, while playing a Division I sport, working three jobs, and founding Lucid.

# Robots Designed for Facilities Managers
## Helping You Save Time, Increase Profits, and Stay Safe.
[Sherpa Drone](https://lucidbots.com/<https:/lucidbots.com/sherpa-drone?hsLang=en>) [Lavo Bot](https://lucidbots.com/<https:/lucidbots.com/lavo?hsLang=en>)
## Scale your revenue to new heights
#### Boost worker productivity by **1.5-2.5x** with cleaning robots
# You will wish you had found us sooner.
[ ![Elevate Your Efficiency](https://no-cache.hubspot.com/cta/default/22607993/interactive-178709493428.png) ](https://lucidbots.com/</hs/cta/wi/redirect?encryptedPayload=AVxigLKVJtYn40MvlAVtlyb41zGicLlQdEqrxZ8r0X0BnBCIm16FQ6p8iyGCQH7uRgYRK%2FGpTdwRgdnQjJ1%2FIURcAfmVEoV1%2FT%2FaxfdzTSplvhiUcj%2FBvnfz38Ck7kfB78gZDVFehsNaql8xZGMgRxk6qUkaBVwuKPYtfI%2FzW4uP6y3hAA%3D%3D&webInteractiveContentId=178709493428&portalId=22607993&hsLang=en>)
## We've Got Every Corner of Cleaning Covered.
## Sherpa® Drone
The purpose-built cleaning and window washing drone makes tough exterior cleaning and spraying jobs a breeze. The Sherpa Drone takes efficiency, safety, and profitability to the next level.
[ ![Learn More About Sherpa](https://no-cache.hubspot.com/cta/default/22607993/interactive-174744996452.png) ](https://lucidbots.com/</hs/cta/wi/redirect?encryptedPayload=AVxigLJaL4bsFdQs2tKhtiZWvhxImsHo9rY4PCYAaR79RMI4px79UM9krxsa6yY37sdTgI6IitwvzezyF6DnP16eX62pY2zp57H0%2Fa9N%2B%2BXv%2FBr7eobdG%2BV9yeJpjj6JRgsPmsnl6V12RyOaCn%2B1OLhoHkLXKI4pV%2BkF4MS9xzmncbulx0cXFT8%3D&webInteractiveContentId=174744996452&portalId=22607993&hsLang=en>)
![Easy Training compressed-1](https://lucidbots.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Easy%20Training%20compressed-1.png?width=1920&height=1080&name=Easy%20Training%20compressed-1.png)
## Lavo Bot™
Lavo Bot is the ultimate tool for surface cleaning. Taking pressure washing to a whole new level, this powerful cleaning tool makes the hardest projects effortless.
[ ![Learn More About The Lavo Bot](https://no-cache.hubspot.com/cta/default/22607993/interactive-174744996487.png) ](https://lucidbots.com/</hs/cta/wi/redirect?encryptedPayload=AVxigLLq9VUPcN%2BBmq4uCy7amjoZTMHO1prhltU6Pk9FWqWoovW25ZH1izfuzLFI6ZHTvyeRI4o1l2OXigDV%2BJqpAjhRuszTjTZ29xyYTUX6LcKMLWsF9S9m1hLmVkV7cDzy8OCJdSSHaB5XSYe7r%2BjfuBsqcXX1RVl5H9JzVMAB&webInteractiveContentId=174744996487&portalId=22607993&hsLang=en>)
![LAVO_01_053124](https://lucidbots.com/hubfs/LAVO_01_053124.jpg)
## Happy Customers
That's what sets us apart from everyone else.

# Robots Designed for Facilities Managers
## Helping You Save Time, Increase Profits, and Stay Safe.
Sherpa Drone⟨26⟩ Lavo Bot⟨27⟩
## Scale your revenue to new heights
#### Boost worker productivity by **1.5-2.5x** with cleaning robots
# You will wish you had found us sooner.
 ![Elevate Your Efficiency⟨28⟩ ](https://lucidbots.com/</hs/cta/wi/redirect?encryptedPayload=AVxigLKVJtYn40MvlAVtlyb41zGicLlQdEqrxZ8r0X0BnBCIm16FQ6p8iyGCQH7uRgYRK%2FGpTdwRgdnQjJ1%2FIURcAfmVEoV1%2FT%2FaxfdzTSplvhiUcj%2FBvnfz38Ck7kfB78gZDVFehsNaql8xZGMgRxk6qUkaBVwuKPYtfI%2FzW4uP6y3hAA%3D%3D&webInteractiveContentId=178709493428&portalId=22607993&hsLang=en>)
## We've Got Every Corner of Cleaning Covered.
## Sherpa® Drone
The purpose-built cleaning and window washing drone makes tough exterior cleaning and spraying jobs a breeze. The Sherpa Drone takes efficiency, safety, and profitability to the next level.
 ![Learn More About Sherpa⟨29⟩ ](https://lucidbots.com/</hs/cta/wi/redirect?encryptedPayload=AVxigLJaL4bsFdQs2tKhtiZWvhxImsHo9rY4PCYAaR79RMI4px79UM9krxsa6yY37sdTgI6IitwvzezyF6DnP16eX62pY2zp57H0%2Fa9N%2B%2BXv%2FBr7eobdG%2BV9yeJpjj6JRgsPmsnl6V12RyOaCn%2B1OLhoHkLXKI4pV%2BkF4MS9xzmncbulx0cXFT8%3D&webInteractiveContentId=174744996452&portalId=22607993&hsLang=en>)
![Easy Training compressed-1⟨30⟩]
## Lavo Bot™
Lavo Bot is the ultimate tool for surface cleaning. Taking pressure washing to a whole new level, this powerful cleaning tool makes the hardest projects effortless.
 ![Learn More About The Lavo Bot⟨31⟩ ](https://lucidbots.com/</hs/cta/wi/redirect?encryptedPayload=AVxigLLq9VUPcN%2BBmq4uCy7amjoZTMHO1prhltU6Pk9FWqWoovW25ZH1izfuzLFI6ZHTvyeRI4o1l2OXigDV%2BJqpAjhRuszTjTZ29xyYTUX6LcKMLWsF9S9m1hLmVkV7cDzy8OCJdSSHaB5XSYe7r%2BjfuBsqcXX1RVl5H9JzVMAB&webInteractiveContentId=174744996487&portalId=22607993&hsLang=en>)
![LAVO_01_053124⟨32⟩]

generated_description:
**Lucid Bots Overview**

Founded in 2018 and based in Charlotte, NC, Lucid Bots is at the forefront of solving some of the most mundane and hazardous challenges facing various industries today. Their mission is straightforward: they build robots specifically for "dull, dirty, and dangerous" jobs—an area ripe for innovation, especially considering the high turnover rates in sectors like cleaning, which can reach up to 200% annually.

**Key Offerings**

Lucid Bots started as a B2B robotics provider focusing primarily on the cleaning industry. Their flagship product is the **Sherpa Drone**, a game-changing solution designed to clean surfaces ranging from skyscraper windows and stadium domes to industrial tanks, boasting a cleaning speed up to eight times faster than traditional methods. Responding to customer demand, they've since launched a complementary **Lavo Bot**, a ground-based pressure-washing robot.

Together, these products support a range of clients who rely on Lucid Bots' technology daily for safe and efficient property maintenance.

**Operations and Impact**

Lucid Bots operates out of a 20,000 square foot manufacturing facility and headquarters in Charlotte. With a dedicated team of 26 employees, they manage the engineering, manufacturing, and support of their robotics technology. The company is a proud participant of Y Combinator's Batch S19 and is guided by their Group Partner, Nan.

**Market Focus**

Their focus is not limited to just cleaning. Lucid Bots also targets industries such as construction, facility management, and real estate, offering tailored solutions that enhance productivity and safety. Notably, the company aims to empower facility managers by boosting worker productivity by 1.5 to 2.5 times through their innovative automation solutions.

**Why Choose Lucid Bots?**

The strength of Lucid Bots lies not only in its advanced robotics but also in its commitment to customer satisfaction. Their technology not only addresses the labor challenges of hazardous tasks but does so with remarkable efficiency. Happy clients from varied sectors underscore this success, highlighting tangible returns on investment and excellent ongoing support.

In a world where businesses are under increasing pressure to optimize performance, maintain safety, and reduce costs, Lucid Bots is leading the charge, allowing their customers to reclaim time, minimize risks, and enhance operational efficiency.

For more information, visit their website at [Lucid Bots](https://lucidbots.com).
